title: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089 - There is no popup menu when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the java editor in Photon.
OB: When a java editor is opened, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler should display a menu with options to add breakpoints, marks, etc. However, in Photon, this menu is not appearing.
EB: When a java editor is opened, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler should display a menu with options to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR: 1) Open a java editor.2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The menu with options to add breakpoints, marks, etc. should be displayed.
